SACMDefinition.Workspace:
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="pfeiffer2" description="Pfeiffer" expression='number(pfeiffer1,0)' additionalDescription="Si >= 3 Sospita de deteriorament cognitiu (Vermell)|| Si <= 2 No hi ha deteriorament cognitiu (Verd)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<3<=red<11<=orange<=10000)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="hadA8" description="HAD Ansietat" uiReference="colors(0<=green<8<=orange<11<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si <= 7 Normal (Verd)|| si >=8 i <= 10 Límit (Taronja)|| si >= 11 Cas anormal (Vermell)" expression="number(hadA1,0)+number(hadA2,0)+number(hadA3,0)+number(hadA4,0)+number(hadA5,0)+number(hadA6,0)+number(hadA7,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="hadD8" description="HAD Depressió" uiReference="colors(0<=green<8<=orange<11<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si <= 7 Normal (Verd)|| si >=8 i <= 10 Límit (Taronja)|| si >= 11 Cas anormal (Vermell)" expression="number(hadD1,0)+number(hadD2,0)+number(hadD3,0)+number(hadD4,0)+number(hadD5,0)+number(hadD6,0)+number(hadD7,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="barthel11" description="Barthel" uiReference="colors(0<=red<61<=orange<91<=green<=10000)" additionalDescription="Si <= 20 Dependència total (Vermell)|| si > 20 i <= 60 Dependència severa (Vermell)|| si > 61 i <= 90 Dependència moderada (Taronja)|| si > 91 i <= 99 Dependència lleu (Verd)|| si = 100 Independent (Verd)" expression="number(barthel1,0)+number(barthel2,0)+number(barthel3,0)+number(barthel4,0)+number(barthel5,0)+number(barthel6,0)+number(barthel7,0)+number(barthel8,0)+number(barthel9,0)+number(barthel10,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="AnthropometricAl" type="number" multiplicity="maximalOne" description="IMC(P/A)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<30<=orange<40<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si < 30 Risc no molt alt (Verd)|| si >= 30 Risc molt alt (Taronja)|| si >= 40 Risc extremadament alt (Vermell)" expression="round(AnWeighAl/(AnHeightAl/100*AnHeightAl/100),2)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="AnthropometricGenollHomesIMC" type="number" multiplicity="maximalOne" description="IMC Homes(P/D)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<=27<orange<30<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="Home sobrepès si IMC > 27 i si lt;= 29 (Taronja)|| Obesitat si IMC >= 30 (Vermell)" expression="round(AnWeighGenoll/(AnthropometricGenollHomes/100*AnthropometricGenollHomes/100),2)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="AnthropometricGenollDonesIMC" type="number" multiplicity="maximalOne" description="IMC Dones (P/D)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<=27<orange<30<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="Dona sobrepès si IMC > 27 i si lt;= 29 (Taronja)|| Obesitat si IMC >= 30 (Vermell)" expression="round(AnWeighGenoll/(AnthropometricGenollDones/100*AnthropometricGenollDones/100),2)" />
<AttributeDefinition id="nutrition1" type="number.min(0).max(20)" defaultValues="[0.0]" multiplicity="maximalOne" description="Hb (gr/dl)" uiReference="colors(0<=red<12<=green<21<=orange<=10000)" additionalDescription="si < 12 gr/dl Anemia (Vermell)|| si >= 12 gr/dl Normal (Verd)" />
<AttributeDefinition id="nutrition2" type="number.min(0).max(10)" defaultValues="[0.0]" multiplicity="maximalOne" description="Prot (gr/dl)" uiReference="colors(0<=red<6<=green<11<=orange<=10000)" additionalDescription="si < 6 gr/dl Desnutrició proteica (Vermell)|| si >= 6 gr/dl Normal (Verd)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="eva3" description="EQND repòs" additionalDescription="Dolor controlat si <= 5 (Verd)|| Dolor no controlat si >= 6 (Vermell)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<6<=red<100<=orange<=10000)" expression="(number(eva1,0))" /> <DerivedAttributeDefinition id="eva4" description="EQND moviment" additionalDescription="Dolor controlat si <= 5 (Verd)|| Dolor no controlat si >= 6 (Vermell)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<6<=red<100<=orange<=10000)" expression="(number(eva2,0))" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="slanssExec8" uiReference="colors(0<=green<12<=red<100<=orange<=10000)" additionalDescription="No hi ha dolor neuropàtic si <= 11 (Verd)|| Hi ha dolor neuropàtic si >= 12 (Vermell)" expression="number(slanssExec1,0)+number(slanssExec2,0)+number(slanssExec3,0)+number(slanssExec4,0)+number(slanssExec5,0)+number(slanssExec6,0)+number(slanssExec7,0)" description="S-LANSS"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="Medication2" description="Compliment farmàcia" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=red<2<=orange<=10000)" additionalDescription="si 0 (Verd)|| si 1 (Vermell)" expression="number(Medication1,0)"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="Medication5" description="Dificultat tractament" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=orange<2<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si 0 (Verd)|| si 1 (Taronja)|| si >= 2 (Vermell)" expression="number(Medication1,0)+number(Medication2,0)+number(Medication3,0)+number(Medication4,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="sca5" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=orange<2<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si 0 (Verd)|| si 1 (Taronja)|| si >= 2 (Vermell)" expression="round(number(sca1,0))+round(number(sca2,0))+round(number(sca3,0))+round(number(sca4,0))" description="Capacitat d'autocura"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="dwelling5" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=orange<2<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si 0 (Verd)|| si 1 (Taronja)|| si >= 2 (Vermell)" expression="round(number(dwelling1,0))+round(number(dwelling2,0))+round(number(dwelling3,0))+round(number(dwelling4,0))" description="Habitatge Social"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="career5" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=red<10<=orange<=10000)" additionalDescription="si 0 (Verd)|| si >= 1 (Vermell)" expression="round(number(career1,0))+round(number(career2,0))+round(number(career3,0))+round(number(career4,0))" description="Capacitat Cuidador"/>
<CaseDefinition id="LCS3TEST_Leida" description="CS2 Lleida - Versió Eurecat Testing" ownerPath="LCS3TEST_Settings.CaseManager" clientPath="LCS3TEST_Settings.Patient" entityDefinitionId="LCS3TEST_CaseData" newEntityDefinitionId="LCS3TEST_Settings" newEntityAttachPath="LCS3TEST_Settings" notesDefaultValue='
